mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order(order_seq, user_seq, order_point, order_status, order_user_name, order_user_number, order_delivery, order_invoice, created_at, updated_at) values(seq_order.nextval, #{user_seq}, #{point}, #{status}, #{userName}, #{userNumber}, #{delivery}, #{invoice}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.update: update tbl_order set order_point=#{point}, order_status=#{status}, order_user_number=#{userNumber}, order_delivery=#{delivery}, order_invoice=#{invoice}, updated_at=sysdate where order_seq=#{seq}
